title: Nusunde Lilith
original_name: 盗んで ♥ リ・リ・ス
sinopse: Lilith is a phantom thief who is after genius artist, Michelle Corradi’s portrait. After she had already stolen some pictures, Michelle had the idea to catch her. When she announces to steal his new artwork he met her and fell in love with her. What will he do to meet her again..? (Source: Divine Sanctuary)
